text: Stephen Cambreleng Cowper (born August 21, 1938) is an American Democratic politician. He was born in Petersburg, Virginia. Cowper was the sixth Governor of Alaska from 1986 to 1990. He was governor during the 1989 Exxon Valdez oil spill. ==References== ==Other websites== * Steve Cowper at 100 Years of Alaska's Legislature * Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Alaska Category:Lawyers from Alaska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Virginia Category:People from Fairbanks, Alaska Category:Politicians from Petersburg, Virginia
title: Steve Cowper
